hotels.description: Escape to Crowne Plaza Hong Kong Causeway Bay, an IHG Hotel, a stylish retreat within reach of the hustle and bustle of Kowloon’s city centre. Overlooking the Happy Valley Racecourse and vibrant Causeway Bay, the hotel boasts access to Hong Kong’s major commercial and tourist districts via the nearby Mass Transit Railway (MTR). Within this contemporary hotel, feast on sumptuous global cuisines, toast to your stay at the rooftop bar or cool off in the glittering pool.
